flawed_nl_solution:
Jay invited 22 guests and Gloria invited 36 so they invited 22+36 = <<22+36=53>>53 guests
They also each wanted a flag so in total they would need 1+1+53 = <<1+1+53=55>>55 flags
The craft store has them on sale at 5 for $1 and they need 55 flags so the flags will cost them 55/5 = $11
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 58, not 53. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
